DOC.detailed_description: In Europe , cannabis illicit use drug , mainly psychoactive property ( become `` high '' `` stone '' ) . The active compound cannabis THC ( tetrahydrocannabinol ) . In recent year strength cannabis ( marihuana ) available market Netherland increase ( especially `` netherweed '' ) . The THC-content increased average 8.6 % 2000 average 20.3 % 2004 . Experienced user adapt habit smoking strength cannabis sigaret ( joint ) . However , also group people , mainly young one , intent smoke joint entirely , therefore expose high level THC . Information lack effect cannabis high level exposure . Because , Ministry Health , Welfare , Sports Netherlands order investigator perform study gain insight issue .
